CustomField.description:
Page sequence number in the flow. Use increments of 3 to allow flexibility to insert new pages in an existing flow. Example: Flow sequence numbers : 3, 6, 9, 12 If a new page needs to be inserted as 3rd page then the order could be: 3, 6, 7, 9, 12
This way there is no need to change existing page sequence numbers.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Page sequence number in the flow. Use increments of 3 to allow flexibility to insert new pages in an existing flow. Example: Flow sequence numbers : 3, 6, 9, 12 If a new page needs to be inserted as 3rd page then the order could be: 3, 6, 7, 9, 12
CustomField.label: Sequence Number
